snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo called on the State Assembly to “seriously consider” expelling Micah Z. Kellner and Dennis H. Gabryszak if they did not leave of their own accord.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo calls for Assemblymen Dennis H Gabryszak and Micah Z Kellner, who are facing accusations of sexual misconduct, to either deny reports' veracity immediately or resign; Cuomo's statement comes at end of year in which there have been multiple reports of sexual misconduct in State Assembly.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo called on the State Assembly to “seriously consider” expelling Micah Z. Kellner and Dennis H. Gabryszak if they did not leave of their own accord.

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Tells Assemblymen Accused of Misconduct: Deny It or Resign
